service.info_success_active_ru: Zakaz na podklyuchenie uslugi 'Turbo-knopka' prinyat. Stoimost’ aktivatsii – 0,80 grn s NDS + 7.5% PF. Po faktu podklyucheniya Vam postupit SMS.
service.info_success_active_ua: Zamovlennia na pidklyuchennia poslugy 'Turbo-knopka' pryjnyato. Vartist’ aktyvaciji - 0,80 grn z PDV + 7.5% PF. Pry pidklyuchenni Vam nadijde SMS.
service.info_success_active_en: Request for 'Turbo-button' activation has been accepted. Activation price – 0,80 UAH incl. VAT+7.5% in PF. You will be informed by SMS.
service.info_320191_ru: Na Vashem schetu nedostatochno sredstv dlya zakaza uslugi 'Turbo-knopka'. Popolnite vash schet.
service.info_320191_ua: Na Vashomu rahunku nedostatn'o koshtiv dlya zamovlennya poslugy 'Turbo-knopka'. Popovnit' vash rahunok.
service.info_320191_en: Your balance is not enough to order service 'Turbo-button'. Recharge your balance
service.info_320347_ru: K sozhaleniju polzovanie uslugoj ogranicheno. Pozhalujsta popolnite schet dlja vosstanovlenija dejstvija Vashego nomera.
service.info_320347_ua: Na zhal korystuvannja poslugoju obmezheno. Bud laska popovnit rakhunok dlja vidnovlennya dii Vashogo nomera.
service.info_320347_en: Unfotunately your service has been suspended. Please recharge your account for reactivation of your number.
service.info_320205_ru: Zajavka na podklyuchenie uslugi 'Turbo-knopka' uzhe byla otpravlena. Proverit’ status uslugi *110*221#.
service.info_320205_ua: Zamovlennia na pidklyuchennia poslugy 'Turbo-knopka' vzhe bulo vidpravleno. Pereviryty status poslugy *110*221#.
service.info_320205_en: Request for activation of 'Turbo-button' has already been sent. To check the service status *110*221#.
service.info_320206_ru: Usluga 'Turbo-knopka' otklyuchena. Dlya podklyucheniya naberite *110*231#. Stoimost’ – 0,80 grn s NDS + 7.5% PF.
service.info_320206_ua: Poslugu 'Turbo-knopka' vidklyucheno. Dlya pidklyuchennia naberit *110*231#. Vartist’ - 0,80 grn z PDV + 7.5% PF
service.info_320206_en: Service 'Turbo-button' is not activated. To activate this service press *110*231#. Price – 0,80 UAH incl. VAT+7.5% in PF
service.info_320412_ru: K sozhaleniju polzovanie uslugoj ogranicheno. 'Turbo-knopka' dostupna tol'ko pri aktivirovannoj usluge: “Super Bezlimit na mesyac,“Super Bezlimit na nedelju”, “Super Internet na den”, “Super Internet”.
service.info_320412_ua: Na zhal korystuvannja poslugoju obmezheno. 'Turbo-knopka' nadajet'sja til'ky pry aktyvovanij posluzi: ”Super Bezlimit na misyac”, Super Bezlimit na tyzhden”, ”Super Internet na den”, ”Super Internet”.
service.info_320412_en: Unfotunately your service has been suspended. 'Turbo-button' is accessible only at the activated service: “Super Unlim for month”, Super Unlim for week”, “Super Internet for day”, “Super Internet”.

service.info_success_active_ru: Zakaz na aktivaciu uslugi «Super Internet» prinyat. Ozhydajte SMS s podtverzhdeniem aktivacii.
